reviewText: Not bad Spanish-language Mexican-made thriller.  A man is accused of a crime he didn't commit.  He is jailed and his brother smuggles an invisibility drug to him so he can escape and find the guilty party.  OK take on The Invisible Man story.  The transfer is fine.  My only complaint is that I ordered this DVD new via Amazon and it arrived with the case cracked and the cover looked like it had some wear on it.  Otherwise recommended.
